text.data: Matelite: Is anybody here?! It's me! Matelite![end]
Taicho: It is I, Taicho! We have just arrived![end]
Matelite: How rude! Nobody's here to greet us! Taicho, follow me![end]
Sendak: Ah, the good old Kahna flagship... It still seems to be doing just fine...[end]
Sendak: I was your captain at one time. Do you remember?[end]
Sendak: [character][0x9]... hmm... Not bad, [character][0x0]![end]
Rush: This is our castle in the sky! Let's go to the bridge![end]

Truce: The others that joined up earlier are waiting.
If my memory is correct, there were two girls and two dangerous lancers.[end]
Bikkebakke: So this is our new house... It sure does sway back and forth a lot...[end]
We're the ship's crew. Follow our boss. Don't go anywhere you shouldn't.[end]

It's so lonely without Princess [character][0x1] here...
I think we, the crew, will also be useful to you...[end]
Hornet: It's about time! So you're the leader of the Resistance. I'm this ship's new pilot, Hornet! Your friends are waiting on the bridge![end]
Hornet: Come with me![end]
Captain Sendak hasn't changed a bit from when he was young![end]
This entrance is currently being inspected. Please enter from over there.[end]
Dragonkeeper: I am the Dragonkeeper. I take care of the dragons. They're really hungry right now.[end]
Good work, [character][0x0]! We have a suspicious character locked up in here.[end]
Excellent work, [character][0x0]! We have some really rowdy guy locked up in here.[end]
Shopkeeper: We're here to help as much as we can.[end]

Oh no!
I'm a friend! I'm part of the crew! I changed into a disguise and was hiding, that's all.[end]
Sendak: Hey... [character][0x0]. Wait a minute. There's something I want to talk to you about.[end]
Sendak: The truth is... we need to think of a new name for the ship. But... I'm not very good at that kind of thing... I'm sure you can come up with a good one. Please, choose a really hip name![end]
Matelite: Taicho, where are you!?[end]
Taicho: Matelite! I am stuck in here![end]
Matelite: Hmph! [character][0x9]!![end]
[character][0x9]! Let's go![end]
Matelite: Hmph! [character][0x0]! I can't believe you'd go on ahead and leave us here! Can't you wait?![end][end]
